name: Oh Craps!
description:
Roll the dice in this sokoban-style puzzle game set on a craps table.

Made in just a few hours at the end of the GMTK Game Jam 2022. The game was quite rushed, and I may update the game with improved levels and mechanics after the jam, but I wanted to get something out there before it ended.

https://www.puzzlescript.net/play.html?p=e9c010e04097ed3d86182ebb9e11b27d
